description: Other issues include gambling and support for drug users are also debated in Wolverhampton.
title: Wolverhampton teens grill politicians about youth violence
title_page: Wolverhampton teens grill politicians about youth violence - BBC News
maintext:
Gambling, youth violence and support for drug users have been the key topics for a group of young people as they grilled local politicians.
The teenagers in Wolverhampton joined the city council's leader and deputy mayor in a replica of a full council meeting.
Youth violence was highlighted as the youngsters debated a campaign developed by young people, called My Tomorrow, to tackle the issue.
The harm caused by gambling and what drug and alcohol support services were available for children were also raised by the group, the city's youth council.
